dict.string:
An undead knight class raised to serve again. Master of death, decay, and shadow magic with three unique specializations:
• PLAGUEBEARER - Master of disease and decay - Pestilence: Transform into a fast-moving plague cloud with damage reduction - Sickly: Melee attacks apply bleeding and vulnerability
• VOID KNIGHT - Empowered by Shadow Curse - Soul Vortex: Channel a frontal cone of void magic that grants Shadow Curse - Cursed: Gain Strength and Vitality based on Shadow Curse stacks
• ARMOURED HUSK - An unstoppable undead juggernaut - Unwavering Oath: Cheat death by transforming into a zombie - Stronger Together: Strengthen minions and unlock new types
Features: - Summon undead minions to fight by your side - Bone Shield for damage mitigation - Death Grip to pull enemies close - Full localization support (English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Ukrainian, Chinese)
